translations: v．潦草地书写，乱涂：以潦草、难以辨认的笔迹书写或绘画。
· He scrawled a note to his sister before leaving.
他离开前潦草地给他妹妹写了张便条。

sentences.sentence: He scrawled his name across the bill.
sentences.translation: 他在账单上草草地写了他的名字。

sentences.sentence: He scrawled a hasty note to his wife.
sentences.translation: 他草草写了张便条给他妻子。

sentences.sentence: Someone had scrawled all over my notes.
sentences.translation: 不知谁在我笔记上胡写乱画，弄得一塌糊涂。
